section.title: Rating Levels:
section.p: Be sure to list the date the testing for each task was completed.

section.title: Recognition:
section.p: When testing for the NCCER Training Program, record performance testing results and submit completion dates through NCCER's online Testing System.

row.entry: Interpret drawings and verbal instructions for fitting/assembling.
Apply math calculations and use standard/metric forms of measurements to lay out and fit parts.
Square and mark work surfaces using the 3-4-5 method.
Perform proper fit procedures related to fitting tasks in the downhand (flat) position, including:

li.p: Miscellaneous structural items (chocks, headers, collars, brackets, clips)

row.entry: Fit up plate joints using alignment tools and check for misalignment and poor fit-up.

p.b: Please make sure that both the Candidate/Trainee and Performance Evaluator sign and date this form on the signature lines to follow.
